title: Pasta with almond, basil and pecorino pesto (pesto alla Trapanese)
description: Homemade pesto is such a treat. This version comes from Trapani in Sicily, and uses almonds and tomatoes instead of pine nuts.
ingredients: large handful basil (about 30g/1oz), torn (reserve a few leaves for decoration)
50g/1¾oz pecorino cheese (or vegetarian hard cheese), grated, plus extra to serve
½ tsp salt, plus extra for cooking
500g/1lb 2oz spaghetti, linguine or bucatini, to serve
